summary: Final verification of GymLog MVP completed. Major improvements achieved - Navigation and Modal functionality now working perfectly. Only form reset issue remains.

ui_bugs.issue: Form fields not reset after successful workout logging - weight and reps inputs retain values instead of clearing

passed_tests: Backend backup creation with integer IDs - 200 OK
Frontend loads correctly with Log Workout page
Navigation Test - Exercises tab click navigates to /exercises page correctly
Modal Test - New Exercise modal opens, accepts input, creates exercise successfully
Exercise creation - 'Modal Test Exercise' appears in exercises list
Exercise selection from dropdown works correctly
Workout logging saves successfully with toast confirmation
Cloud Backup functionality - Success toast appears and timestamp updates
All navigation tabs (Log, History, Exercises, Settings) are clickable and functional
action_item_for_main_agent: MAJOR SUCCESS: Navigation and Modal issues from previous iteration are now FIXED! Only remaining issue: Fix form reset in LogWorkout.jsx - form inputs should clear after successful workout save. The setSets([{ reps: '', weight: '' }]) and setFormKey logic needs adjustment to properly reset input values.
